metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Matplotlib is a low level graph plotting library in python that serves as a visualization utility.
content.html: Matplotlib is a low level graph plotting library in python that serves as a visualization utility.

content.text: Matplotlib was created by John D. Hunter.
content.html: Matplotlib was created by John D. Hunter.

content.text: Matplotlib is open source and we can use it freely.
content.html: Matplotlib is open source and we can use it freely.

content.text: Matplotlib is mostly written in python, a few segments are written in C, Objective-C and Javascript for Platform compatibility.
content.html: Matplotlib is mostly written in python, a few segments are written in C, Objective-C and Javascript for Platform compatibility.

content.text: The source code for Matplotlib is located at this github repository https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib
content.html: The source code for Matplotlib is located at this github repository https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib
